meanings.definition: A person or thing that renders something.
meanings.sent1: The renderer carefully painted the walls of the house.
meanings.sent2: The renderer delivered the final version of the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The renderer decided to render the old furniture with a new coat of paint.
meanings.sent4: As a renderer of emotions, she captured the essence of the scene perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The skilled renderer transformed the plain canvas into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A computer program or software that processes images or graphics.
meanings.sent1: The graphic designer used a powerful renderer to create stunning visuals.
meanings.sent2: The renderer enhanced the quality of the 3D model rendering.
meanings.sent3: The renderer program had a quirky glitch that distorted the images.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, the renderer is the artist's best friend.
meanings.sent5: The renderer software worked tirelessly to produce realistic animations.

meanings.definition: A substance used to render something.
meanings.sent1: The builder applied the renderer to the exterior walls for protection.
meanings.sent2: The renderer mixture gave a smooth finish to the concrete surface.
meanings.sent3: The renderer material had a unique texture that added character to the wall.
meanings.sent4: The white renderer contrasted beautifully with the dark bricks.
meanings.sent5: The renderer compound dried quickly, saving time on the project.
